root.name: light()
root.description: Add a new light source. Each light has a location, color, and type as specified by the parameters passed into the function.
root.syntax: light(x, y, z, v1, v2, v3, type)

parameter.label: x
parameter.description: int or float: x-position of light source

parameter.label: y
parameter.description: int or float: y-position of light source

parameter.label: z
parameter.description: int or float: z-position of light source

parameter.label: v1
parameter.description: int or float: red (or hue) value for the light's color

parameter.label: v2
parameter.description: int or float: green (or saturation) value for the light's color

parameter.label: v3
parameter.description: int for float: blue (or brightness) value for the light's color
